languages.text: "Благодарю вас, Ваша Светлость!" {n}Губернатор низко кланяется, а затем бросает на сына взгляд, полный горечи и разочарования.{/n} "Что касается твоего поста... думаю, ты сменишь его на менее ответственную должность".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю вас, Ваша Светлость!" {n}Губернатор низко кланяется, а затем бросает на сына взгляд, полный горечи и ненависти.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю вас, Ваша Светлость!" {n}Губернатор низко кланяется, а затем бросает на сына взгляд, полный горечи и разочарования.{/n} "Что касается твоего поста... думаю, ты сменишь его на менее ответственную должность".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And about your post... I think you will be placed on a position that requires less responsibility."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And about your post... I think you will be placed on a position that requires less responsibility."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The Governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your office... I think you will be appointed to a position that requires less responsibility."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The Governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your office... I think you will be appointed to a position that requires less responsibility."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「感謝いたします、陛下！」{n}総督は頭を低く下げると、息子を敵意と失望をたっぷり込めたまなざしで見る。{/n}「それと、お前の職位についてだ…今よりも責任の軽い地位につけようと思う」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."

traits.locale_text: 「感謝いたします、陛下！」{n}総督は頭を低く下げると、息子を敵意と失望をたっぷり込めたまなざしで見る。{/n}「それと、お前の職位についてだ…今よりも責任の軽い地位につけようと思う」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “感激不尽，大人！”{n}总督深深地鞠了一躬，痛苦而沮丧地瞥了儿子一眼。{/n}“至于你的工作……我准备把你调到一个无需担负重任的职位。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."

traits.locale_text: “感激不尽，大人！”{n}总督深深地鞠了一躬，痛苦而沮丧地瞥了儿子一眼。{/n}“至于你的工作……我准备把你调到一个无需担负重任的职位。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Merci infiniment, Votre Seigneurie ! » {n}Le gouverneur s'incline au plus bas puis se tourne vers son fils, les traits tirés par l'amertume et la frustration.{/n} « Quant à toi... Je te ferai muter à un poste qui implique moins de responsabilités. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."

traits.locale_text: « Merci infiniment, Votre Seigneurie ! »{n}Le gouverneur s'incline au plus bas puis se tourne vers son fils, les traits tirés par l'amertume et la frustration.{/n} « Quant à toi... Je te ferai muter à un poste qui implique moins de responsabilités. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «¡Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». {n}El gobernador se inclina ante ti y mira a su hijo con frustración.{/n} «Y en cuanto a su cargo... Creo que se le reasignará a un puesto que requiera menor responsabilidad».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». {n}El gobernador se inclina ante ti y mira a su hijo con frustración.{/n} «Y en cuanto a su cargo... Creo que se le nombrará para un puesto que requiera menor responsabilidad».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Der Gouverneur verneigt sich tief und wirft seinem Sohn dann einen verbitterten und frustrierten Blick zu.{/n} "Und was Eure Stellung angeht ... Ich denke, Ihr werdet auf einen Posten versetzt, der weniger Verantwortung mit sich bringt."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Der Gouverneur verneigt sich tief und wirft seinem Sohn dann einen verbitterten und frustrierten Blick zu.{/n} "Und was Euer Amt angeht ... Ich denke, Ihr werdet auf einen Posten versetzt, der weniger Verantwortung mit sich bringt."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, size şükürler olsun!" {n}Ayaklarına kapanan vali, sonrasında kasvetli ve hayal kırıklığıyla dolu gözlerle oğluna bakıyor.{/n} "Makamına gelince... Daha az sorumluluk gerektiren bir mevkiye atanman uygun olur."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The governor bows low, then gives his son a look full of bitterness and frustration.{/n} "And as for your position... I think you will be reassigned to a role requiring less responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, size şükürler olsun!" {n}Vali ayaklarına kapanıyor, ardından oğluna kasvetli ve hayal kırıklığıyla dolu gözlerle bakıyor.{/n} "Senin makamına gelince... Daha az sorumluluk gerektiren bir mevkiye atanman uygun olur."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
